text: Approval for a change to the name of the product from "Bone Void Filler" to "Bone Graft Substitute."  The device, as modified in designation, will be marketed under the trade name "Pro Osteon Implant 500 Porous Coralline Hydroxyapatite Bone Graft Substitute Blocks and Granules," and is indicated for the same indications approved in the original PMA and in P860006/S002.
